name: src/submodules/Resonance/src/resonance.mjs
ResonanceSingleton
description: Class for managing sounds

unknown.tagValue: ResonanceSingleton
Resonance does not have a license at this time. For licensing contact the author

https://github.com/doubleactii

Safari does not support .ogg files, so if you are using safari, do not use .ogg files or this library will not play that sound on safari.
Otherwise, you can use .ogg on any other platform. Cordova included. This supports mp3, wav, ogg, etc.

description: The max volume to be used

name: MIN_VOLUME
description: The min volume to be used

name: MAX_RECYCLED_SOUNDS

name: MAX_PLAYBACK_RATE
description: The max speed this sound can be played at

name: FRAME_RATE
description: The frame rate at which to fade the sounds

The checker function to resolve to true or false denoting if a sound can be played
Master control over which sounds can play

name: enableChecker
description:
API for the developer to define when a sound can and cannot be played. Any sound that tries to play while this returns false will not play
Enables a checker to become the master checker over whether a sound can play
If their defined conditions return false, then the sound cannot be played

This will start playing sounds that were initially blocked by not having a user gesture.
This will also restart sounds when a mobile device backs out of an app, and then rejoins the app

description:
Kills this sound. Wipes it, and recycles it if the recycle manager isn't full.
If the recycle manager is full, this sound will become an empty class instance.

params.name: pAmount
params.description: The amount to interpolate between the start and end values.

return.description: The interpolated value between the start and end values based on the specified amount.

name: flooredLerp
description: Linearly interpolates between two values by a specified amount and returns the result as a floored integer.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The interpolated value between the start and end values based on the specified amount, rounded down to the nearest integer.

params.name: pStart
params.description: The start value to interpolate from.

params.name: pEnd
params.description: The end value to interpolate to.

params.name: pAmount
params.description: The amount to interpolate between the start and end values.

return.description: The interpolated value between the start and end values based on the specified amount, rounded down to the nearest integer.

name: round
description: Rounds a number to a specified number of decimal places.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The rounded number to the specified number of decimal places.

params.name: pNumber
params.description: The number to round.

params.name: pPlace
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

return.description: The rounded number to the specified number of decimal places.

name: normalize
description: Normalizes a value between a minimum and maximum value.

unknown.tagValue:
{number} The normalized value between 0 and 1 based on the input value's position between the minimum and maximum values.
If the difference between pMax and pMin is 0, returns 1 to avoid dividing by zero.

params.name: pVal
params.description: The value to normalize.

params.name: pMin
params.description: The minimum value for normalization.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value for normalization.

return.description:
The normalized value between 0 and 1 based on the input value's position between the minimum and maximum values.
If the difference between pMax and pMin is 0, returns 1 to avoid dividing by zero.

name: normalizeRanged
description: Normalizes a value between a minimum and maximum value, clamped to the range of -1 to 1.

unknown.tagValue:
{number} The normalized and clamped value between -1 and 1 based on the input value's
position between the minimum and maximum values. If the difference between pMax and pMin is 0,
returns 1 to avoid dividing by zero.

params.name: pVal
params.description: The value to normalize.

params.name: pMin
params.description: The minimum value for normalization.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value for normalization.

return.description:
The normalized and clamped value between -1 and 1 based on the input value's
position between the minimum and maximum values. If the difference between pMax and pMin is 0,
returns 1 to avoid dividing by zero.

name: within
description: Checks if a value is within a range of minimum and maximum values (inclusive).

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if the value is within the range (inclusive), false otherwise.

params.name: pVal
params.description: The value to check.

params.name: pMin
params.description: The minimum value of the range to check against.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value of the range to check against.

return.description: True if the value is within the range (inclusive), false otherwise.

name: formatIntegerWithCommas
description: Formats a number by rounding it to the nearest integer and adding commas to separate thousands places.

unknown.tagValue: {string} A string representation of the formatted number.

params.name: pNum
params.description: The number to format.

return.description: A string representation of the formatted number.

name: toRadians
description: Converts degrees to radians.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle in radians.

params.name: pDegrees
params.description: The angle in degrees.

return.description: The angle in radians.

name: toDegrees
description: Converts radians to degrees.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle in degrees.

params.name: pRadians
params.description: The angle in radians.

return.description: The angle in degrees.

name: pick
description: Returns a random element from the given array.

unknown.tagValue: {*} A random element from the array.

params.name: pArray
params.description: The input array.

return.description: A random element from the array.

name: removeProperties
description: Removes properties from an object except those listed in the exclude array.

params.name: pObject
params.description: The object to remove properties from.

params.name: pExclude
params.description: The array of property names to exclude from removal.

name: prob
description:
Returns true with probability proportional to the given number.
The higher the number, the higher the chance of returning true.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} - Returns true or false, based on the probability value.

params.name: pChance
params.description: The probability value, between 0 and 100 (inclusive).

return.description: Returns true or false, based on the probability value.

name: getInverseDirection
description: Gets the inverse direction of the direction passed

unknown.tagValue: {string} The inverse direction

params.name: pDirection
params.description: The direction to get the inverse of.

return.description: The inverse direction

name: getAngleFromDirection
description: Calculates the angle (in radians) from a given direction.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle (in radians) associated with the given direction.

params.name: pDirection
params.description: The direction to calculate the angle from.

return.description: The angle (in radians) associated with the given direction.

throws.description: Throws an error if the direction is not recognized.

name: centerRectangleOnParent
description: Centers a rectangle (defined by its dimensions) within a parent rectangle.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} An object representing the new coordinates of the centered rectangle: { x: centerX, y: centerY }.

params.name: pChildWidth
params.description: The width of the child rectangle.

params.name: pChildHeight
params.description: The height of the child rectangle.

params.name: pParentWidth
params.description: The width of the parent rectangle.

params.name: pParentHeight
params.description: The height of the parent rectangle.

params.name: pParentX
params.description: The x-coordinate of the parent rectangle.

params.name: pParentY
params.description: The y-coordinate of the parent rectangle.

return.description: An object representing the new coordinates of the centered rectangle: { x: centerX, y: centerY }.

name: getRandomAngle
description: Generates a random angle in radians.

unknown.tagValue: {number} A random angle in radians.

return.description: A random angle in radians.

name: getAngle
description: Gets the angle between two points

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle between the starting point and the ending point

params.name: pStartPoint
params.description: The starting point

params.name: pEndPoint
params.description: The ending point

return.description: The angle between the starting point and the ending point

name: getAngle2
description: Gets the angle between two points but in VYLO / PIXI coordinate space. Removes 180 degrees from a raw angle

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle between the starting point and the ending point

params.name: pStartPoint
params.description: The starting point

params.name: pEndPoint
params.description: The ending point

return.description: The angle between the starting point and the ending point

name: convertRaWAngleToVyloCoords
description: Converts a raw angle to be the proper angle in Vylocity. By removing 180 degrees

unknown.tagValue: The converted angle

params.name: pAngle
params.description: The angle to convert.

return.description: The converted angle

name: getMinimal
description: Gets the minimal value between the value to add and the maximum allowed value.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The minimal value between the value to add and the remaining value to reach the maximum.

params.name: pCurrent
params.description: The current value.

params.name: pAdd
params.description: The value to add to the current value.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value that can be reached.

return.description: The minimal value between the value to add and the remaining value to reach the maximum.

name: getDistance
description: Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points in a two-dimensional space.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The Euclidean distance between the two points.

params.name: pStartPoint
params.description: The starting point with x and y coordinates.

params.name: pStartPoint.x
params.description: The x-coordinate of the starting point.

params.name: pStartPoint.y
params.description: The y-coordinate of the starting point.

params.name: pEndPoint
params.description: The ending point with x and y coordinates.

params.name: pEndPoint.x
params.description: The x-coordinate of the ending point.

params.name: pEndPoint.y
params.description: The y-coordinate of the ending point.

return.description: The Euclidean distance between the two points.

name: calculateNewPositionFromDistanceAndAngle
description: Calculates the new position of a point based on distance and angle.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} The new position of the point after moving by the specified distance and angle.

params.name: pPoint
params.description: The initial position of the point with x and y coordinates.

params.name: pPoint.x
params.description: The initial x-coordinate of the point.

params.name: pPoint.y
params.description: The initial y-coordinate of the point.

params.name: pDistance
params.description: The distance by which to move the point.

params.name: pAngle
params.description: The angle (in radians) at which to move the point.

return.description: The new position of the point after moving by the specified distance and angle.

name: calculateProportionalLength
description: Calculates the proportional length based on a current value, a maximum value, and a specified total length.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The proportional length based on the current value, maximum value, and total length.

params.name: pCurrent
params.description: The current value to be scaled.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value for scaling.

params.name: pTotalLength
params.description: The specified total length.

return.description: The proportional length based on the current value, maximum value, and total length.

name: getDirection
description: Calculates the compass direction based on the given angle.
examples:
const angle = Math.PI / 4; // 45 degrees in radians
const direction = getDirection(angle); // Returns 'northeast'

unknown.tagValue: {string} The compass direction (e.g., 'east', 'southeast', 'south', etc.).

params.name: pAngle
params.description: The angle in radians.

return.description: The compass direction (e.g., 'east', 'southeast', 'south', etc.).

name: linearDecay
description: Calculates the linear decay of a variable over time.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The remaining value of the variable after linear decay.

params.name: pInitialValue
params.description: The initial value of the variable.

params.name: pCurrentTime
params.description: The current time at which to calculate the variable value.

params.name: pMaxTime
params.description: The maximum time for the decay process.

params.name: pDecayRate
params.description: The decay rate (default is 0.5).

return.description: The remaining value of the variable after linear decay.

name: generateID
description: Generates a unique id

unknown.tagValue: A unique ID

params.name: pIDLength
params.description: The length of the ID to create

return.description: A unique ID

name: decimalToHex
description: Converts a color in decimal format into hex format

unknown.tagValue: The decimal color converted into hex format

params.name: pDecimal
params.description: The color in decimal format

params.name: pChars
params.description: The length to make the hex string

return.description: The decimal color converted into hex format

name: addIntensity
description: Add intensity to this color to get a brighter or dimmer effect

params.name: pColor
params.description: Color in hex format or decimal format

params.name: pPercent
params.description: The percent of brightness to add to this color

name: rgbToHex
description: Converts an RGB color value to a hexadecimal color value.

params.name: pR
params.description: The red component of the RGB color value (0-255).

params.name: pG
params.description: The green component of the RGB color value (0-255).

params.name: pB
params.description: The blue component of the RGB color value (0-255).

name: hexToRgb
description: Converts a hexadecimal color value to an RGB color value.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} - An array containing the red, green, and blue components of the RGB color value.

params.name: pHex
params.description: The hexadecimal color value to convert (e.g. "#FF0000" for red).

return.description: An array containing the red, green, and blue components of the RGB color value.

name: rgbToDecimal
description: Converts RGB color values to a decimal value.

params.name: pR
params.description: The red component of the RGB color value (0-255).

params.name: pG
params.description: The green component of the RGB color value (0-255).

params.name: pB
params.description: The blue component of the RGB color value (0-255).

name: hexToDecimal
description: Converts a hexadecimal color value to a decimal value.

unknown.tagValue: {number} - The decimal representation of the hexadecimal color value.

params.name: pHex
params.description: The hexadecimal color value to convert (e.g. "#FF0000" for red).

return.description: The decimal representation of the hexadecimal color value.

name: grabColor
description: Convert a color to different formats or get a random color

unknown.tagValue:
{ColorObject} A color object with various different export options.
hex, hexTagless, rgb, rgbArray, rgbObject, rgbNormal, decimal formats.

params.name: pSwitch
params.description:
A hex string representing a color (with or without the tag)
A color formatted in the decimal format. Or the r value of a rgb color.

params.name: g
params.description: g value of a rgb color

params.name: b
params.description: b value of a rgb color

return.description:
A color object with various different export options.
hex, hexTagless, rgb, rgbArray, rgbObject, rgbNormal, decimal formats.

name: getRandomColor
description: Gets a random color

unknown.tagValue: {string} A random color in the hex format

return.description: A random color in the hex format

name: getRandomColorBetween
description: Gets a random color between two colors

unknown.tagValue: {string} A random color in the decimal format

params.name: pColor1
params.description: The first color to get a color between

params.name: pColor2
params.description: The second color to get a color between

params.name: pAmount
params.description:
The closer the random color will be to either input colors on a range of 0-1
0 to 0.5 (closer to pColor1)
0.5 to 1 (closer to pColor2)

return.description: A random color in the decimal format

name: transitionColor
description: Transition a color to another color in pDuration time.

unknown.tagValue: An ID that references this transition to be passed to cancelTransition to stop an ongoing transition.

params.name: pInstance
params.description:
The instance to transition it's color property.
pInstance's color will be transitioned either via pInstance.color = newColor
or
pInstance.color.tint = newColor (if the color is defined as an object)

params.name: pStartColor
params.description: The start color

params.name: pEndColor
params.description: The end color

params.name: pDuration
params.description: The duration of the transition

params.name: pIterativeCallback
params.description: Callback to call every tick of the transition

params.name: pEndCallback
params.description: Callback to call at the end of the transition

return.description: An ID that references this transition to be passed to cancelTransition to stop an ongoing transition.

name: cancelTransitionColor
description: Cancels an ongoing transition

params.name: pID
params.description: The ID of the ongoing transition to cancel

name: getPointRotated
description: Calculates the position of a point after rotating it around a center point by a given angle.

unknown.tagValue: {object} An object with the rotated point's new x and y coordinates.

params.name: pRect
params.description:
The rectangle object to rotate the point around.
pRect.anchor.x and pRecent.anchor.y is used to control the "center" of the rectangle.

params.name: pTheta
params.description: The angle (in radians) to rotate the point by.

params.name: pPoint
params.description: The point object to rotate around the center of the rectangle.

params.name: pPoint.x
params.description: The x-coordinate of the point to rotate.

params.name: pPoint.y
params.description: The y-coordinate of the point to rotate.

return.description: An object with the rotated point's new x and y coordinates.

name: getPointsOfRotatedRect
description: Calculates the position of a rectangle's corner points and center point after rotating it around a center point by a given angle.

unknown.tagValue: {object} An object with the rotated rectangle's new corner points and center points.

params.name: pRect
params.description:
The rectangle object to rotate the point around.
pRect.anchor.x and pRecent.anchor.y is used to control the "center" of the rectangle.

params.name: pTheta
params.description: The angle (in radians) to rotate the point by.

return.description: An object with the rotated rectangle's new corner points and center points.

name: calculateIconOffset
description: Calculate the icon offset to compensate for a non-zero anchor.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} - The calculated icon offset with properties `.x` and `.y`.

params.name: pIconSize
params.description: The size of the icon with properties `.x` and `.y`.

params.name: pIconSize.width
params.description: The size of the icon's width.

params.name: pIconSize.height
params.description: The size of the icon's height'.

params.name: pAnchor
params.description: The anchor point with properties `.x` and `.y`.

params.name: pAnchor.x
params.description: The anchor's x value.

params.name: pAnchor.y
params.description: The anchor's y value.

params.name: pScale
params.description: The scale factor applied to the object with properties `.x` and `.y`.

params.name: pScale.x
params.description: The scale's y value.

params.name: pScale.y
params.description: The scale's y value.

return.description: The calculated icon offset with properties `.x` and `.y`.

content:
# Core Module

The Core module is a versatile collection of specialized modules designed to enhance the game development experience. Offering seamless integration and a user-friendly interface, this powerhouse module simplifies the utilization of various game development tools. Handy, powerful, and feature-rich, it accelerates productivity by providing a consolidated toolkit for game developers.  

## Installation

### ES Module

```js
import { Core } from './core.mjs';
```

### IIFE (Immediately Invoked Function Expression)

```js
<script src="core.js"></script>;
window.CoreBundle.Core;
```

### CommonJS (CJS) Module

```js
const { Core } = require('./core.cjs.js');
```

### Global Dependency

Core relies on the `VYLO` variable being globally accessible.
name: ./README.md
